response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,200,000 to you. I understand the importance of this investment for you, and I am confident it will bring significant benefits to your endeavors. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive exceptional value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
